body.name: VeeFresh VeeDaily - VeeGentle Intimate Wash & VeeWipes ACV Sensitive Vee Bundle - Apple Cider Vinegar Infused Female Wipes for Women & Natural Feminine Wash for Sensitive Vees!
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
features: 💙 PERFECT pH BALANCE FOR YOUR VEE - It's no secret that your Vee is healthiest if its pH is neither too acidic, nor too basic. Our feminine wipes & feminine wash for women with apple cider vinegar support that balance, whether you use them for daily maintenance or in times of trouble.

💙 ALCOHOL-FREE FEMININE HYGIENE - Alcohol throws off your Vee's balance by disrupting your microbiome. Out of balance, your lady bits are susceptible to health problems. Our feminine hygiene products - women wipes & natural feminine wash are alcohol-free, protecting your Vee's microbiome.

💙 HYPOALLERGENIC, GENTLE AND SAFE - There's no more gentle part of the body than your Vee, so naturally, no ordinary feminine wipes for women or natural feminine wash will do. To keep your Vee happy, your intimate wipes & wash should always be as gentle, safe and completely hypoallergenic.

🍎 ACV CLEANS, CALMS, & HYDRATES: The feminine hygiene wipes & intimate wash women swear by feature a natural formula with apple cider vinegar to gently remove sweat & odor without stripping down your natural oils. The infusion relieves irritations, leaving your bikini area smooth and hydrated.

💙 FOR YOUR DAILY HYGIENE - Use our vagina wipes & wash as solutions after intimacy, during your period or even before and after using the toilet to maintain optimal hygiene & enjoy a fresh Vee. Keep VeeWipes ACV in your purse & VeeGentle at home, for anywhere fresh Vee!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VeeDaily Products don't contain any artificial fragrances that can irritate your intimates, leaving them dry & agitated. The mild natural scent will leave you feeling clean and fresh instead. A pH disbalance can often be a precursor for more serious ailments. VeeGentle & VeeWipes with ACV support the maintenance of a healthy intimate pH balance, improving your defenses & promoting harmony. Using VeeWipes & VeeGentle regularly after sex, during your period or after strenuous physical activity helps combat odors by improving the hygiene & healthy balance of your Vee when it counts most. When it comes to your Vee, there's no middle ground! VeeWipes & VeeGentle are hypoallergenic & non-invasive, meaning they're as natural and pleasant to use as can be.

NATURE-BASED SOLUTIONS VeeFresh is about natural, practical feminine care. Our products serve women who are extra sensitive to common feminine irritants, or just appreciate quality natural feminine care products. FEMALE-OWNED - FEMALE FOCUSED VeeFresh was founded by women in need of natural and practical solutions for extra sensitive Vees! We are as much Female-Owned as we are Female Focused - Feminine Health is our priority. MADE FOR WOMEN ON THE GO You're busy! We know! We are too, so we've focused all our efforts on creating easy to use, travel ready feminine hygiene products that never slow you down when you're out achieving your aspirations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My new go to vaginal wash. Little to no smell. Keeps you fresh all day long. A little pricey but it does a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've tried them and this is the one!!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical when I purchased this product because like I said I have tried quite a few different product's. Ladies please believe me I used this product on 90 plus degree days and guess what? NO sign of odor through the sweating and all. Just try it you won't be sorry and you will have that fresh feeling literally All day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin types
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product because I’m very sensitive to scents and soaps etc but this brand was wonderful. I didn’t experience any discomfort and I always feel fresh after evey use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is perfect!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love the wash and the wipes! I have been using them for months now and I'm fresh all day!! Even through out my intense workouts and hot days. Amazing!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: This product has been good to me so far. I feel fresh and clean. I’ve been suffering with vaginal sweat & odor for quite some time. So, hopefully I’ve found the remedy. I will follow up after more use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I found my new love!
reviews.reviewText: I have never wanted to shove my kewchie in someone’s face more than I do now. It completely got rid of the sweaty smell from being a thicc girl and now I have a natural odor that’s intoxicating. I won’t use anything else!

reviews.reviewText: Ladies when I tell you! You need this! Get you some! I just wish they sold just the wipes in the orange pack separately! Because this product is it!!
